sections.name: Use
sections.text: to regrow hair on the top of the scalp (vertex only, see pictures on side of this carton)

sections.name: Directions
sections.text:
apply half a capful 2 times a day to the scalp in the hair loss area
massage into scalp with fingers, then wash hands well
see enclosed booklet for complete directions on how to use
using more or more often will not improve results
continued use is necessary to increase and keep your hair regrowth or hair loss will begin again

sections.name: Inactive ingredients
sections.text: butane, butylated hydroxytoluene, cetyl alcohol, citric acid, glycerin, isobutane, lactic acid, polysorbate 60, propane, purified water, SD alcohol40-B, stearyl alcohol
